attributes.action: Look at how security officers can be more protected in our line of work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Security officers are on the front line and yet they are not aloud to protect or arm them selfs, the police force can carry, handcuffs, pepper spray, battons but yet security offices have nothing! how are we surposed to deal with violent offenders?? all we can do is call the police, and yet in that time waiting w can be stabed!! i think more powers should be given to front line security officers. The government brought in the "sia licencse" which in my oppinion is nothing more than money making at our exspence! WE NEED MORE PROTECTION!!!!
